{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LevelOne |model=WGR-6012 |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B0043SFBSG |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/17/2010 |manuf_country= |manuf=AMIT |manuf_model=CDE570AM |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PBLCDE570AM |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV160BB-70TIP |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=LevelOne |default_ssid_regex=^LevelOne$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''300Mbps Wireless Gigabit Router''
[http://global.level1.com/Home-Products/Broadband-Routers/300Mbps/WGR-6012/1059.html Product page]
[http://global.level1.com/downloads.php?modelstr1=WGR&modelstr2=6012&sendtype=0 Downloads] [http://www.hkepc.com/forum/viewthread.php?tid=1754410 Pictures] The default SSID appears to be '''LevelOne'''. ==Images== File:LevelOne WGR-6012 front.jpg File:LevelOne WGR-6012 back.jpg File:LevelOne WGR-6012 side.jpg File:LevelOne WGR-6012 bottom.jpg [[Has images::external| ]]
